thread.title: Following in Netherlands' footsteps, Swiss TV trolls Trump in welcome video | Entertainment & Showbiz from CTV
thread.title_full: Following in Netherlands' footsteps, Swiss TV trolls Trump in welcome video | Entertainment & Showbiz from CTV News

author: Jeff Lagerquist, CTVNews.ca
title: Following in Netherlands' footsteps, Swiss TV trolls Trump in welcome video | Entertainment & Showbiz from CTV
text:
A cheeky satirical video has made a case for U.S. President Donald Trump to consider “Switzerland second.”
Citing reasons like a mutual love of Russia, a lack of Mexicans, and women who are all “10s,” the nearly four-minute clip follows on the heels of a Dutch welcome video aimed at preferential treatment from the new U.S. administration.
“Listen Donald. We totally understand it is going to be America first. But can we just say Switzerland second,” said the film’s narrator in a spot-on Trump impression.
The video from the Swiss comedy show “Deville Late Night” has been viewed more than 450,000 since it was posted on Thursday. Many are using the hashtag #SwitzerlandSecond to tweet the video at Trump.
“Dear Mr. President, welcome to this introduction video about Switzerland, the sexiest country in Europe. Look at those mountains those big fat mountains. We’re not flat, like for example the Netherlands. They’re so flat. Total disaster,” said the film’s narrator.
The video makes liberal use of sweeping shots of the Swiss Alps and dated footage of Swiss women frolicking in bucolic pastures, while bragging about the fact Swiss women were not allowed to vote in parts of the country until 1991.
“We also love to treat our women badly,” said the narrator. “We grab them by the civil rights. They let us do it. It was great.”
The film goes on to boast that Switzerland is so pretty even the slums are clean, the flag is a “huge plus,” and the Swiss invented gangster rap and Brexit (which would be better named “Swexit” or “Switzerleave”).
Yes #SwitzerlandSecond @realDonaldTrump https://t.co/Tb8u2tvMnU 
— Elouan Indermühle (@E_Indermuhle) February 3, 2017 After Netherlands and Denmark, now the most brutally honest intro to Switzerland, ever. #SwitzerlandSecond #EverySecondCounts pic.twitter.com/Ftg3Mh97KP 
— Carlos Rivas (@CarlosRivasFdez) February 3, 2017 🇨🇭We don't even want your money. We already have it. 💰 https://t.co/49SFJ15Yob @itsgreateu #everysecondcounts #switzerlandsecond #deville 
— Die Lemurenkönigin (@DieLemurengang) February 2, 2017 Related Stories Video introducing Trump to the Netherlands goes viral Related Links SWITZERLAND SECOND
